PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-14541999-08-060HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisOrder requesting the Canadian Radio-Television and Telecommunications Commission to report to the Governor in Council on the establishment of a PAN-CANADIAN FRENCH-LANGUAGE ARTS TELEVISION SERVICE that reflects the uniqueness of Quebec culture and the needs and circumstances of French- language communities across Canada.
